Enable Extended Crops Pack.Description: (Recommended) Adds a large variety of 40+ crops and bushes in addition to the essential pack.

Enable Extended Trees Pack.Description: (Recommended) Adds a large variety of 30+ fruit trees in addition to the essential pack.

Enable Herbs Pack.Description: Adds 20+ new herbs as crops and trees.

Category Overrides.Description: Enables turning some items into the 'Nut' and 'Mushroom' categories. No mechanical effect.

Vanilla Category Overrides.Description: Enables turning some vanilla items into the 'Nut' and 'Mushroom' categories. No mechanical effect.

Disable Grape Bushes.Description: Disables grapes and/or white grapes as bushes and reinstates them as standard trellis crops.

Enhanced Mixed Seeds.Description: With Item Extensions Framework, adds some Cornucopia crops to vanilla mixed seeds.

Rename Cheese Press.Description: Changes the name of the Cheese Press to 'Press', and the description to include tofu.

Retexture Cheese Press.Description: Changes the image of the Cheese Press to remove the cheese icon.

Map Edits.Description: Enable small map edits (currently just adds sapodilla trees to Ginger Island).

SVE Compat Patch.Description: Removes some Cornucopia duplicates of SVE crops and fruit trees. Balance is not guaranteed.
